original_text: For they all contributed out of their abundance, but she out of her poverty has put in everything she had, all she had to live on.”
korean_text: 그들은 다 그 풍족한 중에서 넣었거니와 이 과부는 그 가난한 중에서 자기의 모든 소유 곧 생활비 전부를 넣었느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: For they all contributed out of their abundance
but she out of her poverty
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 여자는 자신의 가난 가운데서

sentences.original_text: has put in everything she had
all she had to live on.
